Burger & Frights is a short yet chilling first-person horror game that immerses players in a spine-tingling experience. Set in the eerie hours of the night, the game places you in the role of a late-night cyclist returning home after grabbing a burger. The journey, however, takes a sinister turn as the once-quiet road becomes a corridor of fear filled with unsettling encounters and mysterious events.

The game artfully combines simple yet effective visuals with a retro aesthetic, creating an atmosphere of dread and suspense. As you pedal down the dark, lonely road, youâ€™ll encounter creepy figures, distorted environments, and supernatural occurrences that make every turn of the wheel a test of nerves. The gameplay centers on survival and unraveling the enigmatic events that unfold, with minimal controls that heighten immersion.
